column4: Is there any way to completely restore ubuntu without reinstalling it?
not really. it's more work to do that than to just reinstall
Well, Im trying to fix something. For every program I install I get an error message saying "E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)
so what error ? (you left the interesting part out)
no not something about ... a prcise mesaage plz
Should I just create a folder named that then?
that worked! What did it do?
remove runit, which doesn't work with upstart
